channel.title: 0o java has been very insulting
channel.description:
I had added 0o java on msn about say 10 minutes ago to state something that he had said and i thought was wrong. So it went on and this is the conversation.
[code]- ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: And I can help you with...? ™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says: Hello, its bigmac here :
just to state this
Date Registered: September 01, 2006, 01:36:45 PM
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says: In your profile, so that isn't august. - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: Yeah, hence I said I had an account which got banned your fucking freak! - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: And re-do your research, I said April ™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says: Whats with the swearing? - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: Nothing, you think you've got the authority to treat me like a piece of shit, From what I gather on the forums. I'm only returning the favour ™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says: Yeh, whatever dude. And in what way did i treat you like shit? ™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says: And why were you banned - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: Because I was being insultive to a noob. - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: Oh great, You've gone and got Pwnd involved ™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says: And you know that how? - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: Omg are you dumb or just blind? ™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says: im not on the thread. - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: And this is the way, -_- You just graduated from first time poster -_- Juniour Member. !! DOUCHE!
- ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: or for you I'll make it simpler - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: -_- You just graduated from first time poster -_- Juniour Member. !! DOUCHE! _________________________________________________________________ That's how ™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says: You really need to get a life. Insulting for no reasons. - ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says: I need to get a life, You may have a life but it's on fucking runescape You dick'ed[/code]
And then after that he blocked me -_-. I don't find this appropriate for saying that his profile says he registered on september 1st and he shouted at me about him being banned -_-. I made one small mistake and he snapped pretty much.

item.title: 0o java has been very insulting

@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

wow what an ass hole I wouldnt of even bothered with him…

item.title: 0o java has been very insulting
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

I had added 0o java on msn about say 10 minutes ago to state something that he had said and i thought was wrong. So it went on and this is the conversation.

[code]- ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:
And I can help you with…?
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
Hello, its bigmac here :

just to state this

Date Registered: September 01, 2006, 01:36:45 PM

™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
In your profile, so that isn’t august.

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

Yeah, hence I said I had an account which got banned your fucking freak!

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

And re-do your research, I said April
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
Whats with the swearing?

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

Nothing, you think you’ve got the authority to treat me like a piece of shit, From what I gather on the forums. I’m only returning the favour
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
Yeh, whatever dude. And in what way did i treat you like shit?
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
And why were you banned

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

Because I was being insultive to a noob.

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

Oh great, You’ve gone and got Pwnd involved
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:

™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
And you know that how?

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

Omg are you dumb or just blind?
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
im not on the thread.

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

And this is the way, -- You just graduated from first time poster -- Juniour Member. !! DOUCHE!

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

or for you I’ll make it simpler

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

-- You just graduated from first time poster -- Juniour Member. !! DOUCHE!

That’s how
™ツ๑۩۞۩๑ツB1G-M4Cツ๑۩۞۩๑ツ™---- says:
You really need to get a life. Insulting for no reasons.

  •                                                                                                          ρ ไ ช ΛΛ ΛΛ ع я says:

I need to get a life, You may have a life but it’s on fucking runescape You dick’ed[/code]

And then after that he blocked me --. I don’t find this appropriate for saying that his profile says he registered on september 1st and he shouted at me about him being banned --. I made one small mistake and he snapped pretty much.
